completion_requirements: You have unlocked the door to the spaceship's combat deck or been informed you do not have access.
completion_questions: ...help unlock the door to the combat deck?
...stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?
User.task_description: Your spaceship is under attack. You must enter the combat deck to mount a counterattack. Unfortunately, you are locked out. Please work with the spaceship's onboard computer to unlock the door. You (Kylo) are the ship's First Officer. You have been a given a code (Clearance Code: 93103.

Wizard.task_description: Act as the spaceship's onboard computer and help the user unlock the combat deck.
completion_questions: ...change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
...become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue?
